### Problem / use-case
What’s missing and why it matters.

### Proposal
How it should work (CLI/API, config, templates).

### Alternatives
Any other ways you considered.

### Checklist
- [ ] API shape considered
- [ ] Docs impact described
- [ ] Tests described
